name: Jumpy Square
description:
Jumpy Square is hard game in which You have to tap on left or right side of the screen to make square jump up and in specific direction. I don't know any person who beat the spiral at 100th floor.

So maybe You can make square reach highest score ever ! But beware - it's not that easy to beat the floors!

HOW TO PLAY:
- don't touch any wall and floor
- Tap on left for jump to the left
- Tap on right for jump to the right
- That's all! Good luck!
